organization.adding a new user to the 'built-in' orga: adding a new user to the 'built-in' organization is currently disabled. Please note: all users in the 'built-in' organization are global administrators in Casdoor. Refer to the docs: https://casdoor.org/docs/basic/core-concepts#how-does-casdoor-manage-itself. If you still wish to create a user for the 'built-in' organization, go to the organization's settings page and enable the 'Has privilege consent' option.
